View Javadoc

1   package org.greatage.ioc.cache;
2   
3   import net.sf.ehcache.CacheManager;
4   import net.sf.ehcache.config.CacheConfiguration;
5   import net.sf.ehcache.config.Configuration;
6   import org.greatage.util.CollectionUtils;
7   import org.testng.Assert;
8   import org.testng.annotations.BeforeClass;
9   import org.testng.annotations.DataProvider;
10  import org.testng.annotations.Test;
11  
12  import java.util.Map;
13  
14  /**
15   * @author Ivan Khalopik
16   * @since 1.0
17   */
18  public class TestEhcacheCacheSource extends Assert {
19  	private CacheSource cacheSource;
20  
21  	@DataProvider
22  	public Object[][] getCacheData() {
23  		return new Object[][]{
24  				{String.class, Integer.class, CollectionUtils.newMap("1", 1, "2", 2, "3", 3, "4", 4)},
25  				{Object.class, Object.class, CollectionUtils.newMap("1", null, "2", null, "3", null, "4", null)},
26  				{String.class, String.class, CollectionUtils.newMap("1", "11", "2", "12", "3", "13", "4", "14")},
27  		};
28  	}
29  
30  	@BeforeClass
31  	public void setupCacheManager() {
32  		final CacheConfiguration cacheConfiguration = new CacheConfiguration();
33  		cacheConfiguration.maxElementsInMemory(10);
34  		final Configuration configuration = new Configuration();
35  		configuration.defaultCache(cacheConfiguration);
36  		final CacheManager cacheManager = new CacheManager(configuration);
37  		cacheSource = new EhcacheCacheSource(cacheManager);
38  	}
39  
40  	@Test(dataProvider = "getCacheData")
41  	public <K, V> void testGetCache(final Class<K> keyClass, final Class<V> valueClass, final Map<K, V> data) {
42  		final Cache<K, V> cache = cacheSource.getCache("test");
43  		assertNotNull(cache);
44  		assertEquals(cache.getName(), "test");
45  		cache.clear();
46  		for (Map.Entry<K, V> entry : data.entrySet()) {
47  			cache.put(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
48  		}
49  
50  		for (K key : data.keySet()) {
51  			assertTrue(cache.contains(key));
52  		}
53  
54  		for (Map.Entry<K, V> entry : data.entrySet()) {
55  			final V actual = cache.get(entry.getKey());
56  			final V expected = entry.getValue();
57  			assertEquals(actual, expected);
58  		}
59  		cache.clear();
60  		for (K key : data.keySet()) {
61  			assertFalse(cache.contains(key));
62  		}
63  	}
64  }
This page was automatically generated by Maven
